name: HorseHotel - be the manager of your own ranch!
name_original: HorseHotel - be the manager of your own ranch!
description:
Run your own Horse Hotel
HorseHotel makes you the owner of your own horse ranch. Take care of the horses, look after their needs, and discover exciting games, until they return to their owners happy. You are responsible for their health and well-being. There is enough space on your green pastures for a lot of horses. Each horse has to be examined in order to see if it’s healthy. Feed them, nurse them, and play with them. Make sure they have everything they need before they go back to their owners.

Exciting horse games and challenges
There are different horse breeds waiting for you, and each breed has its own individual needs. Take a look at the horse’s file to find out what exactly the horse needs. This will help you to provide the best care for the horse. If your horse needs more endurance play the obstacle course minigame. If the horse is lacking in confidence, you can build it up with flatwork exercises in the riding arena. To increase its ability, just play the dressage minigame. But one thing all horses have in common: they need your affection, so don’t neglect to give them treats and pet them!

Expand your hotel to take in more guests
To turn your horse ranch into a luxurious hotel, you will find lots of expansions in the shop which will create more space for more horses. But bear in mind that the bigger your hotel gets, the more demanding your guests will become. Earn more coins by completing missions so you can afford to improve your hotel and take care of more and more horses. Besides maintaining your hotel, caring for your horses is the order of the day: clean out their stables everyday so all the horses enjoy a comfortable stay with you!

❀ Run your own hotel for horses and turn it into a luxurious hotel
❀ Discover exciting minigames
❀ Feed and take care of different breeds of horse
❀ Collect coins, complete quests, and spin the wheel of fortune
